::KitKat::

She covered her ears as sound reached her.  She called out to 
Drillbit, "DRILLBIT! Would you please see what is going on with our 
com system in the ship?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Phobias babies scattered around the base doing what any bug would 
do. 
> Pests of any type could find a way to be a nuisance but these bugs 
> knew how to do it with finesse. they got into the ships replicators 
> and tried to interface.
> 
> They got into the ships comm system and created a feedback loop 
which 
> caused a loud squeal of sound to echo through the ship. Jamming the 
> ships main comm was just the first step though.
>
